Name: Atlantic Herring
Habitat/Ecosystem: Pelagic to coastal in cold to temperate waters

Name: Atlantic Walrus
Habitat/Ecosystem: Shallow (80m or less), open water areas with soft sea floors close to land or pack ice

Name: Beluga Whale
Habitat/Ecosystem: Shallow, coastal waters and near ice edge

Name: Bubblegum Coral
Habitat/Ecosystem: Hard or soft sediment in areas with strong currents

Name: Chinook salmon
Habitat/Ecosystem: Freshwater rivers and streams, to open ocean environments

Name: Giant Pacific Octopus
Habitat/Ecosystem: Coastal intertidal areas to waters deeper than 100m

Name: Green Sea Turtle
Habitat/Ecosystem: Sea grass beds, sandy beaches and open ocean

Name: Greenland Halibut/Turbot
Habitat/Ecosystem: Soft bottoms in arctic and temperate waters

Name: Greenland shark
Habitat/Ecosystem: Cold, deep waters of the Arctic and Atlantic Ocean

Name: Humpback Whale
Habitat/Ecosystem: High latitude summer feeding grounds; low latitude winter breeding grounds

Name: Leatherback Sea Turtle
Habitat/Ecosystem: Coastal to open ocean; deep diver

Name: Narwhal
Habitat/Ecosystem: Sheltered deep-water coastal areas and deep fjords

Name: Northern Gannet
Habitat/Ecosystem: Nest on rocky shores & cliffs; feed in the ocean

Name: Northern Shrimp
Habitat/Ecosystem: Soft bottoms with features that provide protection

Name: Pacific Herring
Habitat/Ecosystem: Pelagic to coastal in cold to temperate waters

Name: Sea otter
Habitat/Ecosystem: Shallow, coastal waters; often found in kelp canopies
